sentences.en: Banking and financial services produce very high earnings, and a lot of people are trying to get onto the gravy train.
sentences.cn: 银行和金融服务行业收入很高, 很多人都想得到这种美差.
你不能叫这种东西肉汁吧？

sentences.en: Gravy is made from the dripping ( s ).
sentences.cn: 调味肉汁是用 炙 肉的油汁做的.

sentences.en: I always spatter my blouse with gravy when I eat.
sentences.cn: 吃饭的时候，我总是把肉汁溅到衬衣上。

sentences.en: My fantasy spills soup and gravy.
sentences.cn: 由于我在胡思乱想,倒翻了菜汤和肉汁.

sentences.en: Skim the fat off from the gravy.
sentences.cn: 把肉汁表面的油脂撇去.

sentences.en: Some gravy was spilled out on the table cloth.
sentences.cn: 台布上溅上了一些肉汁.

sentences.en: The meat was swimming in gravy.
There was a smear of gravy on his chin.
They will even pour gravy on your sandwiches if you let them.
sentences.cn: 如果你愿意的话，他们甚至会给你的三明治浇上肉汁。

sentences.en: Two china jugs held steaming gravy.
sentences.cn: 两个瓷罐子装着热气腾腾的肉卤.

sentences.en: Use flour to thicken the gravy.
We were disgusted when bosses awarded themselves a massive pay rise. How can they get on the gravy train, but ask us to take a wage freeze?
sentences.cn: 看到老板为自己大幅加薪，我们感到十分气愤。他们凭什么轻轻松松捞油水却要求我们不涨工资？

sentences.en: You have spilled gravy on the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 你把肉汁泼到台布上了.

sentences.en: You'd better skim the fat from the gravy.
sentences.cn: 你最好把肉汁表面的油脂撇去.

words.tran_cn: 肉汁；不法利润；轻易得来的钱

phrases.tran_cn: 调味汁瓶；酱油壶；船形调味肉汁盘

trans.tran_cn: 肉汁，肉卤，〈美俚〉非法所得的钱，意外之财
trans.tran_en: a sauce made from the juice that comes from meat as it cooks, mixed with flour and water
